title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 154.5 - Monitoring requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 154.5 - Monitoring requirements

State Regulations

Every insurer shall submit a plan for monitoring the effectiveness of its multi-tier program in depopulating the AIP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
154.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
